commitResults.messageTitle: Add initial skeletal version of the Flash
Add Greet, Echo, Exit on skeletal of Flash
Add ability to store and list user input text
Add Mark/Unmark as Done
Add Task class to represent tasks
Update code to comply with coding standard
Update code to comply with coding standard
Update code to comply with coding standard
Add and update new classes and functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
Created new classes such as ToDo, Deadline and Event to
make known the different types of tasks.

A superclass Task is inherited by the child classes to
allow inheritance of pre-existing instances to make it
more neat and easy to comprehand.

To carry out a Text Ui Testing followed by reviewing code
to aline with code quality standards.

Update code to improve Code Quality
Update code to improve Code Quality
Add user input error handling
Improve Code Quality of markOrUnmark feature
Add error handling for all types of tasks
Add validation to markOrUnmarkTask
commitResults.messageBody:
A new class have been added called DukeException. This class is used
to track for exceptions that are specific to Duke.java program.

Streamline the validation for typeOfTask, in coporated extra validation
to check and if it user input spaces instead of leaving it blank.

To address the user input for taskDetails next and validate to see if
user have typed in the event detail correctly or have left blank.
If time permit, else leave validation for wk6 ip

commitResults.messageTitle: Update to improve Code
commitResults.messageBody:
Edited the code to improve both coding standards and code quality.
Noted the feedback from the pull request and had made the necessary
changes.

Will be commiting this and merging to master branch before pushing.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a few packages to the project
commitResults.messageBody:
More specifically, packages that consist of duke as overall and sub
packages such as duke,command and duke.task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add delete function to Duke
commitResults.messageBody:
Added delete functionality to duke and also updated duke to improve Code
Quality. Made use of abstract on Task to simply code.

Will be handling some errors for delete in next commit.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add error handling for delete
commitResults.messageBody:
Added error handling when user does not specify what to delete or
specify something that is unknown.

Updated the print list to include a message that notify the user if
there are no task in the list at present.

Will create tag for Level-6 and A-Collections and will create new
breanch-Level-7 in master for Level-7 task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a create DataFile class to create duke.txt
commitResults.messageBody:
Add a DataFile class to class a duke.txt if it does not exist.
Else, the bot will notify the User that it already existed.`

commitResults.messageTitle: Add save to file, update file, read file
commitResults.messageBody:
Added two new classes which is DataFile and EditDataFile to read, write
and update the file each time the user updates the task list.`
